items.title: Reusable schema for energy value with unit corresponding to a specific accuracy level, e.g., used for suggested wavefunction and charge density cutoffs

accuracy_level.description: Accuracy level determines suggested scalar value.

density.description: Energy cutoff values for charge density plane wave expansion.
